title: Drawing, "Decorative Studies of Ceilings with Grotesque; Studies of Monument with Papal Seale, Sisto V", 1814–18
medium: Pen and ink over graphite on cream laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Recto: Five studies of ceilings with grotesque; study of monument with papal seal of Sisto V. Verso: Three anatomical studies of arms, profile figure, and profile of arm

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Decorative Studies of Ceilings with Grotesque; Studies of Monument with Papal Seale, Sisto V", 1814–18.
1814–18. Pen and ink over graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2305.
